original_text: Other boats from Tiberias came near the place where they had eaten the bread after the Lord had given thanks.
korean_text: (그러나 디베랴에서 배들이 주께서 축사하신 후 여럿이 떡 먹던 그 곳에 가까이 왔더라)

sentences.original_text: Other boats from Tiberias came near the place
sentences.korean_translation: 디베랴에서 온 다른 배들이 그곳에 가까이 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: where they had eaten the bread
after the Lord had given thanks
